text: Deanna Lund (May 30, 1937 - June 22, 2018) was an American actress. She was born in Oak Park, Illinois. Lund was best known for her role in the Irwin Allen television series Land of the Giants, where she played the character of Valerie Ames Scott. Lund died on June 22, 2018 at her home in Century City, California of pancreatic cancer, aged 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Official site Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Oak Park, Illinois
title: Deanna Lund
